mapper.insert: insert into lian_recharge_log (user_id, order_no, order_date, amount, product_type, bank_card, lian_bank_code, bank_name, name, id_card, agree_no, risk_item, return_url, notify_url, status, yintong_pay_no, yintong_pay_result, yintong_settle_date, create_time, update_time, verify_status ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lianBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yintongPayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yintongPayResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yintongSettleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update lian_recharge_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_card = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lian_bank_code = #{lianBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agree_no = #{agreeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, risk_item = #{riskItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_url = #{returnUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notify_url = #{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yintong_pay_no = #{yintongPayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yintong_pay_result = #{yintongPayResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yintong_settle_date = #{yintongSettleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, verify_status = #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where lian_recharge_log_id = #{lianRechargeLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select lian_recharge_log_id, user_id, order_no, order_date, amount, product_type, bank_card, lian_bank_code, bank_name, name, id_card, agree_no, risk_item, return_url, notify_url, status, yintong_pay_no, yintong_pay_result, yintong_settle_date, create_time, update_time, verify_status from lian_recharge_log where lian_recharge_log_id = #{lianRechargeLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select lian_recharge_log_id, user_id, order_no, order_date, amount, product_type, bank_card, lian_bank_code, bank_name, name, id_card, agree_no, risk_item, return_url, notify_url, status, yintong_pay_no, yintong_pay_result, yintong_settle_date, create_time, update_time, verify_status from lian_recharge_log
